alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 13 at 12:21PM PDT until June 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures around freezing will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southeastern Elko County
